name: Tinyfolks
description:
Train your folks, upgrade your town and battle monsters in this minimalist retro-looking strategy RPG!

Train Your Folks!


  • 20+ different classes with unique stats and abilities
  • 15+ different weapons
  • 20+ artefacts with unique effects

Upgrade Your town!


  • 7 different buildings with unique activities
  • Combine classes, craft items, pay for researches or one time bonuses
  • Upgrade each building to unlock new activities

Battle Monsters!


  • 13 Unique biomes
  • 70+ Monsters to defeat
  • Boss Battles, amazing loot

All In Crisp pixel Art Graphics!
The town needs you, lead your folks to victory and defeat the evil Sorcerer!

If you need to reach out about anything, please send an email to vandermaesengames@gmail.com
